entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate a desktop application at runtime (codegeneration) fails in NET 6 / VS2022 #58540
  • Surface IOperation info to allow analyzers to detect shadow copies for non-readonly methods over in params #58539
  • Syntax highlight breaks down for generic method used as method group for a Delegate param #58538
  • Use type parameters for inferred delegate parameter and return types where possible even if other types are not valid type arguments #58537

Closed

  • Source Generator + Dynamic Implementation of Found Interfaces #58534

PullRequests

Created

  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Visit anonymous type and optionally custom modifiers in VisitType. #58541
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58536
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Refactor IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor usage in MethodCompiler #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Break binding cycles caused by type forwarders. #58535
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Introduce local formatting #47510
    Area-IDE, Community
